attributes.action: Ban the proposed march by Anjem Choudary & Islam4uk through Wootten Bassett.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister & his Government to publicly air their view on Anjem Choudary & Islam4uk`s plans to march through Wootten Bassett and to ban this march from ever taking place.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
